title: Correction to: Relating soil moisture and Sentinel-2 vegetation index patterns to spruce bark beetle infestations prior to outbreak
content: This is a correction to: Chunyan Xu, Michael Förster, Tobias Gränzig, Johannes May, Birgit Kleinschmit, Relating soil moisture and Sentinel-2 vegetation index patterns to spruce bark beetle infestations prior to outbreak, Forestry: An International Journal of Forest Research, 2024; https://doi.org/10.1093/forestry/cpae007
siteTitle: Forestry: An International Journal of Forest Research Current Issue
